channel.title: How do i get a source?
channel.description: I created a Hamachi thingy, but i don't know to connect it to moparscape so that i can edit files and make the monsters have health, be able to use magic and range etc. If someone could help me, i would really appreciate it.

item.title: How do i get a source?
item.dc:creator: @EATALOT2002 EATALOT2002
item.description:
@EATALOT2002 wrote:

there is a source download in my sig its my personal source.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get a source?
item.dc:creator: @darkandlightjak5 darkandlightjak5
item.description:
@darkandlightjak5 wrote:

to get a source download one… Go into RS2 Downloads, and pick a source you like. download and you’re done. Edit it, or whatever you want to do with it.

Read full topic
